ca.nengo.math.impl

Class SineFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.nengo.math.impl.SineFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SineFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Function
    Function wrapper for sin(omega x), where x is in radians and omega is the angular frequency. TODO: test
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SineFunction()
      Uses default angular frequency of 2pi and amplitude of 1
